price: 信道而且迁居，并借自己的财产和生命为主道而奋斗者，在安拉看来，是品级更高的；这等人就是成功的。
arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَهَاجَرُواْ وَجَٰهَدُواْ فِي سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ بِأَمۡوَٰلِهِمۡ وَأَنفُسِهِمۡ أَعۡظَمُ دَرَجَةً عِندَ ٱللَّهِۚ وَأُوْلَٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلۡفَآئِزُونَ

version.title: Chinese Translation - Muhammad Makin
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Chinese by Muhammad Makin. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: alladhīna āmanū wahājarū wajāhadū fī sabīli al-lahi bi-amwālihim wa-anfusihim aʿẓamu darajatan ʿinda al-lahi wa-ulāika humu al-fāizūna
